text: Rick Ravon Mears (born December 3, 1951) is a retired American race car driver. He is one of four men to win the Indianapolis 500 four times (1979, 1984, 1988, 1991). He was added in the Motorsports Hall of Fame of America in 1998.Rick Mears at the Motorsports Hall of Fame of America ==References== Category:1951 births Category:Living people Category:American racecar drivers Category:Sportspeople from Wichita, Kansas
title: Rick Mears
